person.persName: Abraham W. Stone (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier - 11th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of James E. Stone and Catharine Stone. Married to Sarah Ann Baker Stone in Grant County, Kentucky on December 1, 1850. Father of Margaret J. Stone and John H. Stone. Farmer in Grant County in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a sergeant and second lieutenant from September 22, 1862 to July 14, 1865.
